article_title: Ira Coleman Of McDermott, On Healthcare Investment, Consolidation, And Value-Based Care

article_metadata.description: Ira J. Coleman, global head of McDermott Will & Emery's corporate & transactional practice, talks about the state of today's consolidating healthcare market.
article_metadata.author: David J. Parnell
